channel.title: How do i get my monsters to have hp?
channel.description: i dont have my own server, i downloaded the moparscape V3.1 the IP is 127.0.0.1, ive just started it and i was making monsters, i wanted to no how do i giv the monsters more then 0hp???? :confused:

item.title: How do i get my monsters to have hp?
item.dc:creator: @x_meh_noob_x x meh noob x
item.description:
@x_meh_noob_x wrote:

[quote=“Timister, post:8, topic:21913”]Exactly, there should be somthign like:

Windows cannot open this file:

File: shops.dat

To open this file, Windows… ECT.

Then you see these 2 buttons, they say:

O Use web servise to find the appropriate program.
O Select program from a list

Click on the 2nd one! The keep loooking and scrolling till you see WordPad, click on that one, and it should work.[/quote]
Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get my monsters to have hp?
item.dc:creator: @Timister Timister
item.description:
@Timister wrote:

Exactly, there should be somthign like:

Windows cannot open this file:

File: shops.dat

To open this file, Windows… ECT.

Then you see these 2 buttons, they say:

O Use web servise to find the appropriate program.
O Select program from a list

Click on the 2nd one! The keep loooking and scrolling till you see WordPad, click on that one, and it should work.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get my monsters to have hp?

item.title: How do i get my monsters to have hp?
item.dc:creator: @x_meh_noob_x x meh noob x
item.description:
@x_meh_noob_x wrote:

[quote=“Timister, post:2, topic:21913”]Go to npc.cfg, if it does not reconise it, make into WordPad, then search (ctrl+f) the NPC ID number… then you should see somthing liek this:

Code:
//----NpcID-----NpcName------------------combat—health
npc = 0 Hans 0 0

Then second ‘0’ is the HP, change that to how many hp you want it to be! If you put too much hp, it will be VERY strong, it will still be the same level but it can hit a 99, LOL so put it atlease 50-120 HP, You can make your self have 225 on EVERY stat, then you may put about 700+ HP.

~EXTRAS~
HOW TO ADD NPC’s!

Go to autospawn.cfg, again if it does not reconise it, make it into WordPad, then put in the NPC’s ID number
EXAMPLE:

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 494 (NPC’s ID) 3256(CoordX) 3418(CoordY) 0(Floor level) 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Male Banker(NPC name)

There, that should be working!

HOW TO EDIT STORES!

Go to shops.cfg, for the LAST time change it to WordPad if it does not reconise, pick a shop
EXAMPLE:
//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item-----ect.
shop = 1 The_Grand_Rares 999999999 999999999 1038 100

That means, that the varrock general store name will be ‘The Grand Rares’ and will also mean that it will have 100 RED party hats in it.

THANK YOU FOR READING![/quote]

I tried this. But Windows doesn’t recognize “shops.cfg”. What can I do?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get my monsters to have hp?

item.title: How do i get my monsters to have hp?
item.dc:creator: @Timister Timister
item.description:
@Timister wrote:

Go to npc.cfg, if it does not reconise it, make into WordPad, then search (ctrl+f) the NPC ID number… then you should see somthing liek this:

Code:
//----NpcID-----NpcName------------------combat—health
npc = 0 Hans 0 0

Then second ‘0’ is the HP, change that to how many hp you want it to be! If you put too much hp, it will be VERY strong, it will still be the same level but it can hit a 99, LOL so put it atlease 50-120 HP, You can make your self have 225 on EVERY stat, then you may put about 700+ HP.

~EXTRAS~
HOW TO ADD NPC’s!

Go to autospawn.cfg, again if it does not reconise it, make it into WordPad, then put in the NPC’s ID number
EXAMPLE:

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 494 (NPC’s ID) 3256(CoordX) 3418(CoordY) 0(Floor level) 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Male Banker(NPC name)

There, that should be working!

HOW TO EDIT STORES!

Go to shops.cfg, for the LAST time change it to WordPad if it does not reconise, pick a shop
EXAMPLE:
//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item-----ect.
shop = 1 The_Grand_Rares 999999999 999999999 1038 100

That means, that the varrock general store name will be ‘The Grand Rares’ and will also mean that it will have 100 RED party hats in it.

THANK YOU FOR READING!

Read full topic
